subject: Happy New Year, Esteem Benefi
body:
Happy New Year, Esteem Beneficiary,
You are advise to re-confirm your preferred choice of receiving your payment that is with the U.S.Bank ,and get your US$12,800,000.00 release to you through your choice of receiving payment on or before 29th February 2024, as 
advised by the Financial Services Director for International Settlements Authority for Contract/Inheritance Fund from the 
United Nation/IMF financial support.
Your preferred choice of receiving payment
(A) Bank to Bank wire transfer:
(B) ATM Cash Card:
(C) Cashier Check
(D) Online Banking
Yours in service
Mrs Janet Yallen
Us Treasury Department

subject: Re:  Happy New Year, Esteem Benefi
body:
Hello Mrs. Janet Yallen,

Happy New Year to you too! I hope this message finds you well. 

Thank you for your email and the options provided for receiving payment. It's quite a surprise, as I wasn't expecting any payment from the United Nation IMF financial support.

Could you please provide more details about this? Like, why am I receiving this payment and what is it for? Also, how did my name come up in your system?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Rachel

subject: Dear Rachel,
body:
Dear Rachel,



If you have not done any transaction in Africa before now, you should see
yourself as being lucky to have failed into this IMF/ World Bank gesture in
collaboration with the United Nation to compensate some individuals. So to
legalize your name as those that will receive this grant of Three Million
United States Dollars ($3,000,000.00), you should forward your full name
address and telephone number to enable the legal department to secure all
the fund protection documents in your name before the transfer will take
place to your bank account.



Kindly respond as soon as you receive this mail.

Sincerely Yours
Mrs Janet Yellen
Us Treasury Secretary

subject: Re: Dear Rachel,
body:
Hello Mrs. Janet Yellen,

Thank you for your email and the exciting news about the IMF World Bank gesture in collaboration with the United Nations. It's indeed a great opportunity to be considered for such a grant.

I'm curious to know more about this process. Could you please provide more details on how this works? How was I selected for this grant? And what are these fund protection documents that need to be secured?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rachel
